title: Activate a Campaign
subtitle: Select a Lead List
description: Choose any lead list from your CRM and assign it to your AI Phone Agent with a single click.
label: Select Lead List

title: AI Initiates Calls
subtitle: Tireless Outbound Dialing
description: Your agent begins calling leads from your unique local number, using our proven, human-like conversation scripts,or your custom sales script.
label: AI Starts Calling

title: Intelligent Qualification
subtitle: Asking the Right Questions
description: The AI engages leads in a natural conversation, asking key qualifying questions about the property's condition, their timeline, and asking price.
label: Qualify Lead

title: Get Sales-Ready Appointments
subtitle: Appointments & Hot Transfers
description: Once a lead is qualified, the AI either books an appointment directly on your calendar or initiates a live hot-transfer phone call to you.
label: Secure Appointment
